results.title: COVID-19 and Early Post-Primary TB: Commonalities of Pathobiology in Pneumonitis and Therapies.
results.text_hl: This is supported by published studies that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Cholecalciferol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002762 @@@vitamin D3@@@ could reduce the severity of both @DISEASE_COVID_19 @DISEASE_MESH:D000086382 @@@COVID-19@@@ and early @<m>DISEASE_Tuberculosis_Meningeal</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D014390 @@@post-primary TB@@@ infections.

results.title: DRTB-HDT: a randomized controlled trial of two adjunctive host-directed therapies in rifampin-resistant tuberculosis.
results.text_hl: BACKGROUND: @DISEASE_Tuberculosis @DISEASE_MESH:D014376 @@@Tuberculosis@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Tuberculosis_Meningeal</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D014390 @@@TB@@@) is a leading cause of morbidity and mortality worldwide.

results.title: Metformin induced autophagy in diabetes mellitus - Tuberculosis co-infection patients: A case study.
results.text_hl: ...@<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ (@<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@MET@@@) is a potential combination drug to elevate @<m>DISEASE_Tuberculosis_Meningeal</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D014390 @@@anti-TB@@@ efficacy.
